name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience specializing in **MERN stack** technologies, specifically **Node.js**, **Express.js**, and **ReactJS**. Proficient in building high-performance solutions with **TypeScript**, employing state management with **Redux**, **Redux-Saga**, and **Reselect**, while leveraging **Styled Components** for scalable UI design. Extensive experience in developing robust back-end architectures using **REST APIs**, and integrating message brokers like **RabbitMQ** and caching solutions including **Redis**. 
Expert in automated testing frameworks such as **Jest** and **Mocha**, and familiar with Git for version control, as well as CI/CD practices utilizing **GitLab CI**. I've successfully delivered enterprise-grade platforms compliant with industry standards and regulations. My comprehensive tech stack further includes **Elastic Stack** and expertise in Jira for project management. 
Additionally, I possess strong foundations in cloud technologies across **Azure** and **AWS**, and a commitment to implementing CI/CD automation and microservices architecture, ensuring the secure and efficient operation of applications in the healthcare and financial sectors.
